#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;


int main() {
    /* Enter your code here. Read input from STDIN. Print output to STDOUT */

    int t,s,n,d,i;
    int a[50];
    cin>>t;

    while(t--){

        cin>>n>>d;
        for(i=0;i<n;++i) cin>>a[i];
        sort(a,a+n);
        s=0;
        for(i=0;i<n-d;++i) s+=a[i];
        cout<<s<<"\n";
    }

    return 0;
}
